about.besides: Besides coding, there are other activities that I love to do.

projects.pro1: Here are some projects I've worked on.

life.description: A full stack web application for prospective dog and/or cat adopters who want to find pets available for adoption.

weather.description: You can search for the weather of your current location or anywhere in the world.

rick.description: Here you will find all the characters in this program filtering them by dimension and each character has relevant information.

crud.description: Web app that allows you to interact with a user API through all http methods.

pokedex.description: This project allows you to see the information of all your favorite Pokemon. You can filter by type or directly by the name of the Pokemon.

ecomm.description: Virtual store containing items for sale with user-friendly interaction.
